adjectives.description: negroid (comparative more negroid, superlative most negroid)

entries.meaning: (anthropology, dated, offensive) having negro features racially. Pertaining to a racial classification of humanity including people indigenous to sub-Saharan Africa and their diaspora in other parts of the world.
(anthropology, dated, offensive) A person with negroid characteristics, particularly coiled hair and very high melanin content giving them dark brown skin.
